item.description: Announcing our annual Bookcrossing Shakespeare Meetup! See the free performance of Coriolanus by the Commonwealth Shakespeare Company in Boston Common with your fellow Boston Bookcrossers! Meet at the Parkman Bandstand 6:30 p.m. (Take the green line or the red line to Park Steet Station.) We'll be around the bandstand for a few minutes, and anyone who comes later than that can find us on the lawn -- I'll prop up the sign. Click here to see what the Bandstand looks like. Things you might want to bring: Something to sit on -- blanket, towel, lawn chair, or something Food - picnic! Beverage - refreshing, non-alcoholic Bug spray - just in case Registered books for release - Boston Common will be full of people who like literature and free things! We will be doing a release walk before the show, so bring registered copies of your books.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be near the bandstand with our very yellow Boston Bookcrossing bags! (see photos below)
item.name: Free Shakespeare in Boston Common: Coriolanus
